scripts.build: yarn workspace typera-common build && yarn workspace typera-express build && yarn workspace typera-koa build
scripts.watch: concurrently -n common,express,koa 'yarn workspace typera-common watch' 'yarn workspace typera-express watch' 'yarn workspace typera-koa watch'
scripts.test: yarn build && jest && yarn workspace typing-tests test
scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md --title '## Table of Contents' && prettier --write README.md
